required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase 1 Clinical Study in Healthy Volunteers to Investigate the Drug-drug Interaction Between Multiple Doses of RO7033877 and Multiple Doses of Colistin Methanesulfonate Sodium (CMS)
clinical_study.official_title: A SINGLE-CENTER, OPEN-LABEL, RANDOMIZED, TWO SEQUENCE, 3-WAY CROSSOVER STUDY TO INVESTIGATE THE INTERACTION BETWEEN MULTIPLE DOSES OF COLISTIN METHANESULFONATE SODIUM (CMS) AND MULTIPLE DOSES OF RO7033877 IN HEALTHY SUBJECTS

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

brief_summary.textblock: This single center, open-label, randomized study will investigate the drug-drug interaction potential between multiple doses of RO7033877 and multiple doses of colistin methanesulfonate sodium (CMS).

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Pharmacokinetics Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Open Label

primary_outcome.measure: Multiple dose pharmacokinetics of RO7033877 and colistin/CMS (as appropriate): Cmax and area under the concentration-time curve (AUC)

arm_group.description: Participants will be randomized to one of two treatment sequences. Sequence 1 is: Period 1, RO7033877; Period 2, CMS; Period 3, RO7033877 + CMS. Each period is separated by a wash-out period of at least 6 days between last dose and start of next treatment.

Participants will be randomized to one of two treatment sequences. Sequence 2 is: Period 1, CMS; Period 2, RO7033877; Period 3, RO7033877 + CMS. Each period is separated by a wash-out period of at least 6 days between last dose and start of next treatment.

intervention.description: Multiple doses of RO7033877 over 2.5 days
Multiple doses of CMS over 2.5 days
Multiple doses of RO7033877 and CMS over 2.5 days

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult male or female (of non childbearing potential) healthy volunteers between 18 to 55 years
- Body mass index (BMI) between 18 and 30 kg/m2
- Non smokers
- Use adequate contraception methods
Exclusion Criteria:
- Evidence of active of chronic disease
- Regular consumption of drugs of abuse
- Infection with human immunodeficiency virus (HIV), hepatits B (HBV) or hepatitis C (HCV)
- History of significant allergic reactions
- Abnormal blood pressure
- Clinically significant abnormalities (e.g. cadiovascular, laboratory values)
